item.title: Master Elian Amaadon
item.description: Master Elian Amaadon A powerful wizard and senior instructor of the Mage College in Neverwinter. Description Appearance Personality Displays earned confidence with a proper bearing. Shows patience and care for his students, even the wild ones. Biography Key Info Senior professor of the Neverwinter mage college Reluctant, but caring remote instructor for Val Relationships Val After much cajoling, Master Elian eventually agreed to teaching Val basic magic via correspondence school. He shows patience and concern for his sometimes wayward pupil.

item.title: Gregor
item.description: Description Gregor is a member of The Vigil and resides on Sigil. Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Gregor answered the call when Rinn’thalas sent and urgent message using his Amulet of the Vigil in 2022-08-03 Import Campaign. Relationships The Vigil Gregor often pulls shifts on communication detail for The Vigil. Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Unidius
item.description: Description Basically a more violent, paranoid, D&D version of Mad-Eye Moody. Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships The Vigil Unidius is occasionally (though perhaps reluctantly) used by The Vigil as a contact/operative in Neverwinter. Quotations Trivia In 2022-08-17 Import Campaign, the old wizard was revealed to have Mind Blank cast on himself, which means he must be a wizard of at least 15th level. References

item.title: Gelfondi
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gelfondi The devil in charge of the operations on the 42nd floor of Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Gelfondi is a horned devil, slightly shorter than usual. He was wearing some type or robes when the party surprised him in 2022-02-02 Import Campaign. Personality The party didn’t give him much time to demonstrate this. Biography Key Info In charge of the 42nd floor. Seems to be leading some study into various forms of torture.

item.title: Clear Wind
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Clear Wind A tabaxi bartender at the Moonlight All-Night Diner in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Val Val is chatty with Clear Wind and calls her “Water Wendy”. Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Denariel
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Denariel A sorceress and leader of a large contingent of drow in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance A female drow. Personality Biography Key Info Denariel desires to take over as mayor of Shadow Leilon. Relationships Val Val took a liking to Denariel and named her “D-Rock”. Denariel took to calling Val, “V-Rock” in return. Quotations Trivia Val’s nickname for Denariel, D-Rock, continues the “-Rock” trend started with G-Rock back in Phandalin.

item.title: Elirion'tar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Elirion’tar Brother to Val and was found working on a ship docked in Neverwinter. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Said he was on way to Chult and said the party could meet him later. Relationships Val Ellie is one of Val’s brothers. Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Aeortis
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Aeortis An apparent young girl who designed much Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance a (supposed) young girl, accompanied by three hellhounds Personality Biography Relationships Oneshoe In payment for giving information to the party, Aeortis required the party to perform a service for her and retrieve a particular soul coin from Fierna’s tower. Oneshoe signed a contract with Aeortis to cement this deal. Key Info expert in crafting obsidian and energy constructs designed much of Fierna’s tower Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Belial
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Belial Belial is the lord of Phlegethos, who jointly rules the fourth layer together with his daughter Fierna. This unusual partnership was allowed by Asmodeus as an exception to the usual requirement of one ruler per layer. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Fierna Quotations Trivia

item.title: Caerwyn Cadogan
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Caerwyn Cadogan A tuathan from the Feywild–once friend and a guide to the realm, now enemy after his betrayal at the Court of Stars. Description Appearance A handsome, anthromorphic fox. Think Disney Robin Hood. Personality friendly and charismatic; though possessed of typical fey enigma. Biography Relationships Key Info initial guide to the Feywild for the party seemingly betrayed the party at the Court of Stars Caerwyn may have been involved with assassination attempt on Queen Titania and subsequent frame up of The Menagerie owed a minor favor to Gimble this was paid by Caerwyn as he helped The Menagerie escape the oubliette prisons they were sequestered in after the attack on Queen Titania Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Carmen
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Carmen Known as one of the most powerful and effective lawyers in Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Due to her extraordinary reputation, Carmen commands exceedingly high fees for her services. In order to pay for these services, the party enters into Tymphal’s Contract. Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Fierna
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Fierna Daughter of Belial, with whom she co-rules Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Described as fiery and even recklessly passionate. Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Gundren Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gundren Rockseeker Gundren Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Late Brothers brother to Tharden Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Val Gundren and Val become fast friends and drinking buddies. Val calls Gundren “G-Rock”, and Gundren calls Val “A real dwarf’s elf.” Key Info Hired the original members of The Menagerie to guard a caravan from Neverwinter to Phandalin.

item.title: Iarno Albrek
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Iarno Albrek human wizard, secret leader of The Redbrands under the name Glasstaff. Description Appearnce Personality Biography Key Info Previously a member of the Lord’s Alliance. Secretly the leader of The Redbrands. In league with The Black Spider Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Ignaroz
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Ignaroz Assistant to Carmen (?) who facilitates creation and administration of Tymphal’s Contract with the The Menagerie. Description Appearance First Meeting the Party a female spined devil, with white spines. overall attractive appearance. After the Caper at Fierna’s Tower After her promotion following the successful Caper at Fierna’s Tower, Ignaroz’s new form is described as: not quite as rough and tumble as a normal bearded devil, but taller and with more “gravitas” Personality calm, intelligent, and pleasant (at least based upon surface dealings with party) Biography Relationships Carmen The two seem quite friendly with each other.

item.title: Keith Stone
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Keith Stone Stone Giant that provides hospitality for the party on the Road of Cinders. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Magrin
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magrin A duergar who serves served as a chief manager of Tymphal’s operations. Description Appearance Initial Meeting in the Torture Room at Fierna’s Tower a now frail and despondent duergar, heavily beaten and lacking teeth After Tymphal’s Punishment Magrin’s essence is now confined within a green steel shield. Magrin’s Betrayal is a sentient shield made by an archdevil of Phlegethos, Tymphal, that houses the soul coin of Magrin, his once loyal assistant.

item.title: Melkor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Melkor Contact that used to work at the tower Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Nyx
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nyx Gimble’s older sister, a rock gnome who is also gifted in Divination. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Growing up, Gimble was told he was an only child. However, some events caused him to believe that he had a missing sister, despite what his village would have him believe. Searching for Nyx was the reason Gimble left his village and started his adventure. See Gimble the Diviner Backstory.

item.title: Oberon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Oberon Oberon, Lord of Beasts, consort of Queen Titania, and member of the Seelie Court. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Incensed by the assassination attempt on Queen Titania that left her comatose, Oberon has been leading an unending form of The Wild Hunt. Oberon suspects the parts was involved in the assassination attempt. Relationships Queen Titania As the consort of the queen, Oberon and Titania have a legendarily tempestuous relationship.

item.title: Psithyron
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Psithyron An imp which still remains in the service of Horns, back from when Horns was a general of Hell. Description Appearance Personality Impish. Biography Key Info Early on in the campaign, Psithyron manifested as a small, devilish figure that Horns had with him when he washed ashore on the beach and Reidoth found him. After the first trip to Hell after the Mount Hotenow katabasis, Psithyron awakened and returned to his imp form.

item.title: Queen Titania
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Queen Titania Archfey and queen of the Summer Court of the Feywild. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info While the party visited the Court of Stars, they witnessed an assassination attempt on Queen Titania which left her gravely injured. The party was imprisoned in oubliettes on suspicion of their involvement in the attack. There are indications that Caerwyn may have been involved in the assassination and/or coverup. From last reports, Queen Titania is still in a comatose state, and this has caused Oberon to rage with an unending Wild Hunt.

item.title: Quilnorae
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Quilnorae Reportedly an elvish paladin whose soul ended up in a Soul Coin in Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Aeortis issues a quest for Oneshoe to retrieve the coin with the soul of Quilnorae. Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Tymphal
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tymphal A duke of Phlegethos, Tymphal was a mechanical master smith whose lesser devil legions and hundreds of duergar slaves toiled in a volcano forge to produce weapons and infernal constructs. Description Appearance An immense, imposing figure–a sort of mixture of golem and fiend. He sports a pair of enormous wings, but his great bulk makes it seem improbably that they could actually carry him aloft. Personality Absorbed in coordinating his operations, Tymphal seemingly thought the party was beneath his interest and did not deign to speak to them directly.

item.title: Veshvor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Veshvor A patron of The Brimstone who crossed Magnanimy. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Veshvor won a special necklace from Magnanimy. Magnanimy took offense to Veshvor’s behavior and asked Rinn’thalas to secure the return of the necklace in exchange for some information. In 2021-11-10 Import Campaign Teambuilding through Larceny, Rinn’thalas, Gray, and Oneshoe worked together to steal the necklace back from Veshvor. Showed ability to charm others, which he unsuccessfully attempted on Gray.

item.title: Waybert Spinzig
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Waybert Spinzig A gnome researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Zilry to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Zilry Zilry is a companion who joins in Wayberts’s study. Quotations Trivia

item.title: Wrath the Chain Devil
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Wrath the Chain Devil A powerful chain devil who reportedly may know something about the whereabouts of Ze’brak. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Magnanimy claimed that Ze’brak may have drawn the ire of Wrath. Wrath may be located in the Jangling Hiter. Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Zarinor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zarinor A white dragon, found bound in chains on the 42nd-floor during the Caper at Fierna’s Tower. Description Appearance Large-sized, white dragon. Personality Abnormally docile and intelligent for a smaller white dragon. Biography Zarinor was slain and had her horde stolen by another dragon, Harion. Key Info Zarinor asks Val to venture to a location in the far north of the Sword Coast to find and slay Harion.

item.title: Zilry
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zilry An elf researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Waybert to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Waybert Spinzig Waybert is a companion who joins in Zilry’s study. Quotations Trivia

item.title: Magnanimy
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magnanimy A regular patron of the The Brimstone, who seems to traffic in information. Description Looks to be a tiefling-ish, higher-class gentleman. Biography Key Info Magnanimy is fond of gambling. He is less fond of losing to those with poor manners. He offers Rinn’thalas information on the whereabouts of Ze’brak, in exchange for the return of a certain item taken from him by another patron at The Brimstone.

item.title: Asmodeus
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography The Lord of the Nine, the Father of Lies — Asmodeus is the archdevil above all archdevils. He rules the Nine Hells of Baator from the ninth layer, Nessus. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Aunt Lyra
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography Gimble’s roving aunt! Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Grundle & Chode
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography A pair of goblins who run a planeskipping arcane oddities shop (Grundle does all the talking). They have a deal with Asmodeus that allows them free passage through Avernus (first layer of the Nine Hells of Baator), and have also said that they visit Waterdeep in the autumn. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Primus
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography The overseer of the plane of Mechanus. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Hawthorne MacDarmott
item.description: Description Appearance A male chromatic dragonborn, constantly shifting between the chromatic colors. Personality Biography He was once the mayor of shadow-Leilon and a herald of Tiamat, until the Menagerie slew him and Val took his jawbone and flaming greatsword. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Krull
item.description: Description Appearance A male tortle. Image property of Wizards of the Coast LLC. Personality Biography Follower of Arkhan the Cruel and gatekeeper of Arkhan’s tower on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Torogar Steelfist
item.description: Description Appearance Image property of Wizards of the Coast LLC. Personality Biography One of Arkhan’s generals on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Cassandra Belacourt
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Cassandra Belacourt Agent of The Reclamation – a party which seeks to reclaim artifacts that should not be out in the wild. Description Appearance A female drow. Personality While interacting with the party in Avernus, Cassandra was very composed and professional. She dealt fairly with the party. Biography Key Info agent of The Reclamation on business in the Hells to track down and return a dangerous criminal Cassandra agreed to assist the party in exchange for the Bag of Devouring, which was the target of her mission.

item.title: The Raven Queen
item.description: Description Appearance Unknown, but most commonly she appears as a floating porcelain mask. Personality Biography A goddess of death and lost souls. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Arkhan
item.description: Description A male red chromatic dragonborn. Image property of Wizards of the Coast LLC. Appearance Personality Biography A devout follower of Tiamat, he maintains a tower on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Tiamat
item.description: Description Appearance A gargantuan five-headed dragon, each head being one of the five types of chromatic dragons. Personality Biography The (evil) Queen of (chromatic) Dragons, Tiamat is imprisoned somewhere on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Uldrak
item.description: Description Appearance Image property of Wizards of the Coast LLC. Personality Biography The empyrean Uldrak quested into the Nine Hells to slay Tiamat and win glory for his deity, Surtur, but he was beaten handily by the dragon queen. The empyrean wasn’t slain; instead, Tiamat cursed him for his impudence by transforming him into a spined devil. The Menagerie found him hiding inside the helmet that he once wore — for millennia, Uldrak has dwelled in this spot, forlornly plotting to restore his true form.

item.title: Mad Maggie
item.description: Description A female night hag. Appearance Personality Biography Head honcho of Fort Knucklebones, a fortified outpost on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Mahadi
item.description: Description A male rakshasa. Appearance Personality Biography Owner of the Wandering Emporium (commonly found somewhere on the layer Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator), and proprietor of Infernal Rapture. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Bel
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography Unwilling advisor and second-in-command to Zariel on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Ralzala
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography A dao who was responsible for guarding the Demon Zapper on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Red Ruth
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography A hag who lives in the Bone Brambles, a region in Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Haruman
item.description: Description A narzugon that the Menagerie encountered in Avernus, the first layer of the Nine Hells of Baator. Appearance Personality Biography He had been one of Zariel’s generals in the time before her fall, and when her host crashed and broke upon the infernal legions, Haruman took it upon himself to deliver judgement upon those of the host who deserted the cause. In the eons since, Avernus has warped and bolstered Haruman; what once was a being of strength and righteousness has been burned away, leaving only a fiendish arbiter of his own justice.

item.title: Lulu
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography A tiny hollyphant that the party met while on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator who once was a longtime friend and ally to Zariel before her fall. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Zariel
item.description: Description Appearance Personality Biography The archduchess of Avernus, first layer of the Nine Hells of Baator. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Mirna Dendrar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Mirna Dendrar Description Human commoner from Phandalin Biography When she was a young girl, she and her family fled from the town of Thundertree after undead overran the place. Relationships Family Mother to Nars and Nilsa Wife to Thel (deceased), who was killed by The Redbrands Key Info Rescued by the party from Redband hideout in Phandalin Agreed to stay on and provide upkeep for Tresandar Manor, after the party had it restored.

item.title: Nezznar, The Black Spider
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nezznar, The Black Spider Description drow wizard (deceased) Biography Key Info defeated by the party in The Wave Echo Cave Relationships Quotations Trivia source of Gimble’s Spider Staff

item.title: Nundro Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nundro Rockseeker Nundro Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships younger brother to Gundren Rockseeker younger brother to Tharden Rockseeker Key Info slain in The Wave Echo Cave by forces of The Black Spider Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Reidoth
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Reidoth Description Reidoth is a gaunt, white-bearded human who doesn’t use two words when one word will do. Though he receives very few visitors, he is reasonably hospitable. Biography See also: https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Reidoth#History Key Info Member of the Emerald Enclave Many years prior, was part of the force which repelled the initial infernal invasion at Mount Hotenow which lead to the eruption and connection to the mystery surrounding the backstory of Horns Relationships old friends with Qelline Alderleaf Horns Found Horns washed up naked on the beach with no memories Reidoth took care of him and taught him his druidic ways Quotations Trivia Reidoth is sometimes referred as “Druid Dad” by the party.

item.title: Sildar Hallwinter
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sildar Hallwinter Human soldier and member of the Lords’ Alliance who accompanies Gundren Rockseeker on travel from Neverwinter to Phandalin. Description Appearance Personality Seemed sincere in his desire to help the townsfolk of Phandalin. Biography Sildar Hallwinter is a retired soldier from the city of Neverwinter, and a member of the Lord’s Alliance. Key Info member of the Lords’ Alliance now a member of the town council of Phandalin Relationships friend of Gundren Rockseeker distrusted Harbin Wester, the previous ruler of the town.

item.title: Sister Garaele
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sister Garaele Description Elf cleric of Tymora who tends the Luck Shrine in town. Biography Key Info member of The Harpers sent party on a quest to get information from a banshee named Agatha about the location of Bowgentle’s spellbook Relationships Gimble Taught Gimble the ritual for Gentle Repose Quotations Trivia

item.title: Tharden Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tharden Rockseeker Tharden Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships older brother to Gundren Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Key Info The dwarf was slain by forces under the command of Nezznar, The Black Spider. Quotations Trivia References

item.title: The Tinkerer
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Harold Peters You know, the Tinkerer. Description Appearance Personality Biography Originally from the Sword Coast, Harold Peters (you know, the Tinkerer) somehow found himself lost in Shadow Leilon. At some point, his wife died, and he was so overcome with grief that he beseeched the Brownstone Spire for her return. His wish was granted, though in a cruel fashion. Relationships Key Info Quotations Trivia References
